general.standard_conclusion: Standard Companion's gameplay is pretty straightforward: you utilise his skills to get buffs while adapting your gameplay based on the standard weapon you have chosen.

artist.paragraph: [Resonate Skill] and [Support Skill] create a [Scarlet Shade] and [Flame Lily] which inflict burn for 5s. After consuming 10 [Flame Lilies] Rafayel gets an ATK buff for 10s and additionally his attack range is also increased. To create more [Flame Lilies] and trigger the [Passive Skill] faster you can use a high speed weapon like [Hunter Firearms].

flame_lily.caption: Flame Lilies summoned by Rafayel

scarlet_shade.caption: Scarlet shade left by Rafayel's Support Skill leaves Burn on exit

artist.summary: Collect [Flame Lily] ⇨ Get ATK buff + range increase

fresh_paint.paragraph: [Charge Attack] and [Support Skill] inflict [Tinctus] stacking it up to 5 times. [Active Skill], [Resonance Skill] or [Ardent Oath]  detonate them, dealing ATK DMG based on the number of stacks and restore HP to both of you. Detonation of 5 stacks reduce enemy's DEF by 20% for 5s. To inflict more [Tinctus] use high speed weapon like [Hunter Firearms].

phantom_of_the_siren.paragraph: [Support Skill] leaves behind [Reprise] which reduces enemies movement speed by 50% for 5s. Using [Support Skill] after a [Passive Skill] leaves [Echo] which increases the DMG dealt to enemies by 10% for 5s. To utilise it faster using high speed weapon like [Hunter Firearm].

echo.caption: Echo circle caused by Rafayel's Passive Skill + Support Skill

abysswalker.paragraph_1: Abysswalker has a special skill called [Potential]. It requires 6 stacks.  You can find it under the HP bar.
abysswalker.paragraph_2: You can collect those by using a [Charge Attack] when you see a [Beacon] on the enemy or by collecting a [Fishtail Beacon] that appears after using a [Support Skill]:
abysswalker.paragraph_3: Triggering that [Potential] on collection all 6 stacks consumes them and increases CRIT Rate by 15% for 5s and allows Rafayel to deal big DMG on the enemy.
abysswalker.paragraph_4: You can also see buffs being applied on your [MC] above your HP bar and his buffs near his icon:
abysswalker.paragraph_5: For Abysswalker there's no actual rotation but in a nutshell:
abysswalker.li_3: on [Support Skill] wait for [Beacon] to collect
abysswalker.li_4: use [Resonance Skill] to pull enemies (and break the shield)

god_of_the_tides.paragraph_1: Your main priorities with God of the Tides in the battle are:
god_of_the_tides.li_1: Building [Faith]: attack with [MC], Rafayel and [Sea Spirits]
god_of_the_tides.li_2: At full [Faith] triggering [Heavenly Rain] (+30% DMG, [Sea Spirits] levels up)
god_of_the_tides.li_3: [Active Skill] (CRIT Rate [Tidal Field], stay inside it)
god_of_the_tides.li_4: [Basic Attack]s + [Support Skill] + [Perfect Dodge] (For creating as much [Sea Spirits] and restoring [Faith])
god_of_the_tides.paragraph_3: Remember to time your main sources of DMG with enemies shields which can be broken only by [Resonance Skill]. You can always check if the buffs up above your HP and near his icon.
god_of_the_tides.paragraph_4: [Sea Spirit] has 3 levels. It can be increased by [Passive Skill]  and R1:
god_of_the_tides.li_6: does DMG based on ATK + HP.

lemurian_sea_god.paragraph_1: Lemurian Sea God may seem quite complex at first but his rotations are quite straightforward and improve with Ranks.
lemurian_sea_god.paragraph_2: Your gameplay is centred around [Sea God Mark] and his Special State. When a [Charged Attack] empowered by [Sea God Mark] hits an enemy, it reduces the [Support Skill] cooldown by 1.5s.
lemurian_sea_god.paragraph_3: Basically he has two states normal and [Divine Favor] that can be changed by reaching [Ocean's Descent]. To active it you need to perform [Basic Attacks] and an [Active Skill] to full your yellow part of the bar. To full Rafayel's white part of it you should click on his icon when his [Support Skill] is up and to trigger it faster you can perform a [Perfect Dodge].
lemurian_sea_god.paragraph_4: At full [Ocean's Descent] button will appear. On trigger it will change the state to  [Divine Favor] for 11s. In that state Rafayel will throw lightning. And you are the main star right now!
lemurian_sea_god.paragraph_5: Consuming [Sea God Mark] is greatly empowered in that state. Additionally [Active Skill]  will generate [Lightning Crystal], dodging right into it will detonate it dealing massive DMG and restoring 0.3 ◆  also reducing [Active Skill] cooldown by 3,3s! When state is over and if the [Lightning Crystal] still exists it will be detonated.
lemurian_sea_god.paragraph_6: Usually you are able to make the rotation 3 times during the [Divine Favor], with Ranks it is possible up to do 4!
lemurian_sea_god.paragraph_7: So the whole rotation will look like this:
lemurian_sea_god.ul_li_1: [Resonance Skill]  +  stack MC's [Basic Attack] & [Active Skill] (don't consume [Sea God Mark] too close to state change) + Rafayel's [Support Skill] +  [Resonance skill]  ⇨
lemurian_sea_god.ul_li_3: consume [Sea God Mark] + [Active Skill] leaves  [Lightning Crystal] + dodge in it (repeat till the end) ⇨
lemurian_sea_god.paragraph_8: If you have time in between  before [Sea God Mark] is restored you can do [Basic Attack]s.
